hadith.text: Urwah bin Az-Zubair narrated that 'Aishah, the wife of the Prophet (ﷺ) said:"The sun was eclipsed during the life of the Prophet (ﷺ). The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) went out to the masjid and stood and said the takbir, and the people formed rows behind him. He bowed four times and prostrated four times, and the eclipse ended before he finished
